channel.title: Who want to? **Read if you want a server**
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I want to make a server but i have some toubles. So im asking you guys, wanna make a server with me?
Im not a newb, i can make things on server etc. But my router is sucks so thats why i wanna make a server whit someone else.
[b]What you need to do:[/b]
- Portforwarding enc, to get server online. (we realy need) - Maybe make a client for download and better graphics. (if we want much ppl then we need) - Making shops and other stuff like mini games. (how the ppl wil get there stuff then) - Getting players. ( no fun with no players he?)
[b]What i can do:[/b]
- Making shops and other stuff like mini games. - Making forums. - Making a website. - Getting players. - Making a economy
So if someone want to, please add me on MSN djordy@live.nl i realy want a server, but i cant get it on with my router.
P.S with the donator money we can buy a VPS if we have to much lag on server.
P.SS we both can host the server.
Greetz,, Killea

item.title: Who want to? **Read if you want a server**
item.dc:creator: @Killea Killea
item.description:
@Killea wrote:

omfg, girona. Who did ever sayt i gonna scam. IM NOT A SCAMMER!

Already found someone. And HE will get all the money, and we not gonna buy a vps.

So your guys change is OVER.

Read full topic

item.title: Who want to? **Read if you want a server**
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

Killea:

Omfg, thats so bulshit om not do that, and btw we both get the files so he can change him self to admin again? im not a bad person, why ppl dont trust anyone. And if you realy think im a big scam, then i will make a pay-pay and let donators donate to him and me? SO STFU

that wouldn’t matter, your hosting so even if he had the files you can still mess him over.

                                            :cool:

Read full topic
